name: NSTreeNode
desc: A node in a tree of nodes.

items.name: init(representedObject: Any?)
items.desc: Initializes a newly allocated tree node that represents the specified object.

items.name: var representedObject: Any?
items.desc: The object the tree node represents.

items.name: var indexPath: IndexPath
items.desc: The position of the receiver relative to its root parent.

items.name: var isLeaf: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the receiver is a leaf node.

items.name: var children: [NSTreeNode]?
items.desc: An array containing receiver’s child nodes.

items.name: var mutableChildren: NSMutableArray
items.desc: A mutable array that provides read-write access to the receiver’s child nodes.

items.name: func descendant(at: IndexPath) -> NSTreeNode?
items.desc: Returns the receiver’s descendant at the specified index path.

items.name: func sort(with: [NSSortDescriptor], recursively: Bool)
items.desc: Sorts the receiver’s subtree using the values of the represented objects with the specified sort descriptors.
